version_description:
Stability improvements.

We are aware of the issue with the iPad 2 and actively working on the fix. Thank you for your patience!

version_name: 3.3:This massive update brings Virtuoso Piano 3 to all your iOS 7 and 8 devices and recommended to all users. As a big thank you for all of you for waiting this long

version_description:
This massive update brings Virtuoso Piano 3 to all your iOS 7 and 8 devices and recommended to all users. As a big thank you for all of you for waiting this long, we included the previously paid instruments in this update, for free!

NEW VERSION AVAILABLE:
Virtuoso Piano 4 is also available on the App Store. It includes 8 studio quality pianos, sampled at multiple velocities. It is truly the most realistic sounding piano on any mobile device.

For any questions regarding this update visit the website:
http://www.virtuosopiano.net

If you’d like to know about future updates, you can follow us on Twitter:
@VirtuosoPiano

- Many small bug fixes
- Fix for an issue that possibly resulted in a crash
- Updates to the audio engine

For any questions regarding this update visit the website:
http://www.virtuosopiano.net

If you’d like to know about future updates, you can follow us on Twitter:
@VirtuosoPiano

What's New in Version 3.3:
This massive update brings Virtuoso Piano 3 to all your iOS 7 and 8 devices and recommended to all users. As a big thank you for all of you for waiting this long, we included the previously paid instruments in this update, for free!
This update improves compatibility with iOS 9.
This release includes improvements and fixes to Virtuoso Piano Free 3.
